content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for showing interest in my apartment, Hassan. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on market research, I believe that a monthly rental price of 1000 Euros is fair for this 25 square meter apartment. What is your budget for rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I can afford up to 800 Euros, but I would like to negotiate with you to get the best possible deal. Can you offer a lower price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand that you are looking for a lower rental price, Hassan. However, I am afraid that I cannot lower the price below 1000 Euros, as it would not be profitable for me as a landlord. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Is there anything else you would like to discuss or negotiate?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you offer a discount or a special deal for me?

I am a student, I am dependable and responsible, and I want to be on good terms with you. I would like to rent the apartment for the longest possible time, preferably for a year or more.

I am willing to sign a long-term lease agreement, and I am willing to pay a security deposit upfront. I am also willing to pay for any maintenance or repairs that may occur during my tenancy.

I am also willing to sign a non-smoking and no pets agreement. I will also ensure that I keep the apartment clean and well-maintained.

I would like to know if there are any other requirements or conditions that you may have for me to rent the apartment.

I would like to agree to the final price and sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Hassan. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and your commitment to being a responsible tenant. Based on your proposal, I am willing to offer you a discount of 50 Euros per month for the entire length of your lease agreement. This brings the monthly rental price down to 950 Euros.

In addition, I am willing to accept a security deposit of three months' rent upfront, which would be 2850 Euros. This is a reasonable amount to cover any potential damages or maintenance costs during your tenancy.

As for any other requirements or conditions, I would simply like to remind you that smoking and having pets are not allowed in the apartment. I also expect you to keep the apartment clean and well-maintained throughout your tenancy.

I am happy to agree to the final price of 950 Euros per month and sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
